purpose: Showcase Titanverse AI Agents feature through static graphic, demonstrating how pharmacists can ask questions during consultations and receive structured, evidence-based, instant responses trained by real pharmacists.
core_message: AI Agents reply directly within chat, trained by real pharmacists on real clinical cases. Structured. Evidence-based. Instant.
summary: Single image static graphic showcasing Titanverse AI Agents feature, addressing common consultation questions ('What's next?', 'Should I refer?', 'Did I miss anything?') with AI-powered chat assistance trained by real pharmacists on real clinical cases.
audience: Prospects interested in AI-powered clinical support
